籤詩版本二:
Ndikukulangizani kuti musamupemphe thandizo chifukwa amawuluka ngati nkhanu, ndipo amakuponyera mivi yachinsinsi.
Ukapita kukatola nkhuni pali njoka muudzu, ukhoza kulumidwa ndi poizoni ndipo udzakhala wachisoni.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro chokhala otetezeka komanso kudzisunga.
Samalani m’zonse.
解曰: Tsekani pakamwa panu ndikugwira mano. Iye ndi wosasamala. Ngati mumadziimba mlandu. Pamapeto pake zimadzivulaza.
籤詩故事一:
◇Msonkhano wa chessboard
Mfumu Taizong ya mzera wa Tang anali kuguba kumadzulo ndipo anatsekeredwa mu mzinda wa Suoyang.
Xue Dingshan adalamulidwa kuti akhale Mtsogoleri Wachiwiri wa Route Marshal ndipo anapita kukapulumutsa Ambuye ndi kutonthoza Xiliao.
Gulu la anthu litatuluka mu Yumen Pass, linafika pa Phiri la Qipan. Atazingidwa ndi anthu masauzande ambiri paphiripo, Dou Yihu, mfumu ya phirilo, inagonjetsedwa ndi mkulu wa asilikali a Tang, Luo Tong. Anagwira chingwe cha nthano ndikumanga Luo Tong.
(ndakatulo yosainidwa ikugwirizana ndi izi)
Dou Xiantong adawona kukongola kwa Xue Dingshan ndipo adafuna kukhala bwenzi la Feng Luan, koma Xue Dingshan adakana. Dou Xiantong adakwiya ndipo adafuna kumukankhira kunja ndikumudula mutu. Pambuyo pake, Dou Yihu adatsogoleranso abale a Qipanshan kubwerera ku Mzera wa Tang kuti akathandize Mzera wa Tang kugonjetsa Western Liao.
聖意: Chitetezo chapanyumba, kudzikonda, kufunafuna chuma, kudikirira bizinesi, ukwati wosaloledwa, Liujia chenjezo labodza, oyenda pansi akutsekereza minda, mphutsi za silika, ziweto zisanu ndi imodzi, anthu osowa, kutsekereza milandu ya anthu, kutayika (Mo Xing) Kusamuka, kusamala, kutaya katundu, matenda ndizovuta kuti achire, phiri manda, zabwino zonse
第X籤: Wopambana malotale makumi atatu ndi asanu ndi awiri
